title: Correction to: Single-Atom Sn-Loaded Exfoliated Layered Titanate Shows Photocatalytic Activity in Hydrogen Generation
content: This is a correction to: Tuğçe Üstünel, Yusuke Ide, Sarp Kaya, Hiroaki Matsumoto, Keisuke Igarashi, Esmail Doustkhah, Single-Atom Sn-Loaded Exfoliated Layered Titanate Shows Photocatalytic Activity in Hydrogen Generation, Microscopy and Microanalysis, Volume 29, Issue Supplement_1, 1 August 2023, Pages 1356–1357, https://doi.org/10.1093/micmic/ozad067.695
